body:
Hi,


Thank you all for help.
I have once again reinstalled radiance (5.0.a.8) - it seems to work now 
- no more ashik2.
Regarding the display/ x11 issue - still working on it - but thanks for 
the hint.


Kind regards,


Paulína

> Re: Preview error - unknown object type "ashik2"
